item.title: Pattern Background
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1418435377061{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}" full_width="false" parallax_speed="0.1" bg_video_transparent="0" height_engle="60px" height_engle_style2="60px"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_column_text]Facebook’s new plan to host news publications’ stories directly is not only about page views, advertising revenue or the number of seconds it takes for an article to load. It is about who owns the relationship with readers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1431666478891{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"]
Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
- Steve Jobs
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Tech companies have always stepped on one another’s toes to try to become people’s gateway to the digital world — the only place people need to go to get what they want. It’s why Google, a search engine, started a social network and why Facebook, a social network, started a search engine. It’s why Amazon, a shopping site, made a phone and why Apple, a phone maker, got into shopping.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1431666493905{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]
Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
- Steve Jobs
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Now, their reach is extending wider, to nontechnology companies like newspapers and magazines. Or, put another way, all kinds of companies are now becoming tech companies.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1431666508073{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"]
Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
- Steve Jobs
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Facebook’s experiment, called instant articles, is small to start — just a few articles from nine media companies, including The New York Times. But it signals a major shift in the relationship between publications and their readers. If you want to read the news, Facebook is saying, come to Facebook, not to NBC News or The Atlantic or The Times — and when you come, don’t leave. (For now, these articles can be viewed on an iPhone running the Facebook app.)[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="true" parallax_speed="0.8" bg_video_transparent="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="onepage1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1422454636838{padding-top: 170px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}" full_width="false" parallax_speed="0.8" bg_video_transparent="0" dt_id="about" row_responsive_large="" row_responsive_medium="" row_responsive_small="" row_responsive_extra_small="" enable_parallax="" loop="" autoplay="" muted="" controls="" show_btn=""][vc_column width="1/1"][cs_custom_heading text="Our philosophy" font_container="tag:p|font_size:60px|text_align:center|color:%23444444" style="style-none" css=".vc_custom_1431452894706{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}" font_format="400"][vc_column_text]

Driven by a passion for great design, the creation of great places and the creative process, Suarez implements innovative ideas across multiple services and lines of business. Creativity. Collaboration. Communication. We share these values among ourselves and with our clients. Our articulation of them will lead us to new challenges and future successes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="true" parallax_speed="0.8" bg_video_transparent="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_separator color="custom" border_width="1" separator_arrow="yes" separator_arrow_type="icon" arrow_width="30px" arrow_color="#eeeeee" accent_color="#eeeeee" icon_class="fa fa-codepen" icon_width="100px" icon_height="100px" icon_bg="#ffffff" icon_border_style="none" separator_arrow_type_link="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1423042523091{padding-top: 150px !important;}" full_width="false" parallax_speed="0.8" bg_video_transparent="0" row_responsive_large="" row_responsive_medium="" row_responsive_small="" row_responsive_extra_small="" enable_parallax="" loop="" autoplay="" muted="" controls="" show_btn=""][vc_column width="1/1"][cs_custom_heading text="Our services" font_container="tag:div|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23444444" style="style-none" css=".vc_custom_1429846733401{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}" font_format="400"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1431453474685{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"]

Suarez draws upon our global resources to provide clients with the most comprehensive set of end-to-end planning, architectural and creative services available in the marketplace today. Always at our table: great architecture rooted in smart planning and urban design, but we take that model to the next level with services like interior design and environmental graphic design, and intelligent engineering and applied technology services. In the end, we create fluid, cohesive, sustainable environments that serve the needs of today and stand the test of time.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="false" css=".vc_custom_1423042554890{padding-bottom: 100px !important;}" row_responsive_large="" row_responsive_medium=""
